BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.mysql.authentication.authenticator.impl.MySQLClearPasswordAuthenticator.authenticate(ShardingSphereUser, Object[]) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.mysql.authentication.authenticator.impl.MySQLNativePasswordAuthenticator.authenticate(ShardingSphereUser, Object[]) accesses list or array with constant index
This API SHA1 (SHA-1) is not a recommended cryptographic hash function
This API SHA1 (SHA-1) is not a recommended cryptographic hash function
This API SHA1 (SHA-1) is not a recommended cryptographic hash function

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.mysql.command.query.text.fieldlist.MySQLComFieldListPacketExecutor.createColumnDefinition41Packets(String) uses iterator().next() on a List to get the first item
This use of java/sql/Statement.addBatch(Ljava/lang/String;)V can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
